trans-unit.source: Describes the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to the normal aspect ratio of that font.
A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font.
The <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches> values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9—lower values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths.

|Font stretch|usWidthClass|% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|2|62.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|4|87.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|5|100.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|6|112.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|7|125.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|150.0%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|9|200.0%| For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *fontStretchesValue* A value expressed as the name string, such as "Condensed", "Normal", or "Expanded".
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> objects.
When the return value is less than zero, `left` is less than `right`.
When this value is zero, it indicates that both operands are equal.
When the value is greater than zero, it indicates that `left` is greater than `right`.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object to compare.
An <xref:System.Int32> value that represents the relationship between the two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Compares a <xref:System.Object> with the current <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object.
The instance of the <xref:System.Object> to compare for equality.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if two instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Compares a <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object with the current <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object.
The instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object to compare for equality.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if two instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> that corresponds to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] usStretchClass value.
An integer value between one and nine that corresponds to the usStretchValue definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
Retrieves the hash code for this object.
An <xref:System.Int32> value representing the hash code for the object.
Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> for equality.
First instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> to compare.
Second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Evaluates two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> to determine if one instance is greater than the other.
First instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> to compare.
Second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> to compare.
if left is greater than right; otherwise, .
Evaluates two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> to determine whether one instance is greater than or equal to the other.

if left is greater than or equal to right; otherwise, .

For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The <xref:System.String> specifying the format to use.
-or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> to use to format the value.
-or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
A <xref:System.String> containing the value of the current instance in the specified format.
Returns a value that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usStretchClass` for this <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object.
An integer value between 1 and 999 that corresponds to the `usStretchClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
Creates a <xref:System.String> representation of the current <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> object based on the current culture.
A <xref:System.String> value representation of the object.
